Header.title: Kings Trade INTL.
Header.paragraph: Hire top quality workforce from Bangladesh

About.paragraph: Kings Trade INTL with License no RL – 348, a recruitment agency licensed/registered with the Ministry of Expatriates and Welfare for labor export activities. The Company is managed by the passionate entrepreneurial Mr.Abu Naser Salahuddin, Managing Director of Kings Trade International Ltd Bangladesh, corporate office: Akram Tower(Level 13), 199 Shahid Nazrul Islam Rd, Dhaka 1000, Bangladesh. We are expertise in providing Human Resource Solutions in various industries. From healthcare to catering we recruit employees by searching and screening the accurate candidate as per our client’s requirements. However, our work does not bound here, along with searching for the perfect candidate, we ensure that we provide the finest training to the candidates and deploy them to work locations. Hence, if you are looking for recruitment solutions then Kings Trade INTL is the ideal organization for you!
Why2: Exporting man power to entire middle east
Expertise with multiple fields of manpower
